languages.text: {n}Хриплый, громкий голос Риззы становится тише.{/n} "Слыхали, недавно на клипер "Святой Когнаций" напали? Весь груз забрали, все ценное вынесли. Ну так вот, мои ребятки-то!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Хриплый, громкий голос Риззы становится тише.{/n} "Слыхали, недавно на клипер "Святой Когнаций" напали? Весь груз забрали, все ценное вынесли. Ну так вот, мои ребятки-то!"

languages.text: {n}Ryzza lowers her booming, raspy voice.{/n} "You heard about how the clipper Saint Cognatius got hit recently? The cargo was cleaned out, everything of value taken. Well, that was my boys' handiwork!"
languages.original_text: {n}Хриплый, громкий голос Риззы становится тише.{/n} "Слыхали, недавно на клипер "Святой Когнаций" напали? Весь груз забрали, все ценное вынесли. Ну так вот, мои ребятки-то!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza tones down her booming, raspy voice.{/n} "You heard about how the clipper Saint Cognatius got hit recently? The cargo was cleaned out, everything of value taken. Well, that there's my cats for you!"

{n}Ryzza tones down her booming, raspy voice.{/n} "You heard about how the clipper Saint Cognatius got hit recently? The cargo was cleaned out, everything of value taken. Well, that there's my cats for you!"

{n}Ryzza lowers her booming, raspy voice.{/n} "You heard about how the clipper Saint Cognatius got hit recently? The cargo was cleaned out, everything of value taken. Well, that was my boys' handiwork!"

{n}Ryzza lowers her booming, raspy voice.{/n} "You heard about how the clipper Saint Cognatius got hit recently? The cargo was cleaned out, everything of value taken. Well, that was my boys' handiwork!"

{n}Ryzza lowers her booming, raspy voice.{/n} "You heard about how the clipper Saint Cognatius got hit recently? The cargo was cleaned out, everything of value taken. Well, that was my boys' handiwork!"

languages.text: {n}莱萨压低了她那洪亮、粗犷的声音。{/n}“你听说‘圣科尼亚蒂乌斯号’最近遇袭的事情吗？上面的货物被搬光了，所有值钱的东西都被拿走了。这么说吧，那就是我的小伙子们干的！”
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza lowers her booming, raspy voice.{/n} "You heard about how the clipper Saint Cognatius got hit recently? The cargo was cleaned out, everything of value taken. Well, that was my boys' handiwork!"

traits.locale_text: {n}莱萨压低了她那洪亮、粗犷的声音。{/n}“你听说‘圣科尼亚蒂乌斯号’最近遇袭的事情吗？上面的货物被搬光了，所有值钱的东西都被拿走了。这么说吧，那就是我的小伙子们干的！”

languages.text: {n}Ryzza baja su sonora y áspera voz.{/n} «¿Ha oído lo del ataque al clíper San Cognatius? Se llevaron toda la carga, no quedó nada de valor. ¡Pues fueron mis muchachos!».
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza lowers her booming, raspy voice.{/n} "You heard about how the clipper Saint Cognatius got hit recently? The cargo was cleaned out, everything of value taken. Well, that was my boys' handiwork!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza baja su sonora y áspera voz.{/n} «¿Ha oído lo del ataque al clíper San Cognatius? Se llevaron toda la carga, no quedó nada de valor. ¡Pues fueron mis muchachos!».

languages.text: {n}リザは響き渡るかすれ声をさらに低くした。{/n}「最近、クリッパー船の聖コグナティウスが襲われた聖コグナティウス話を聞いたかい？貨物は一掃されて、価値のあるものはすべて略奪されたのさ。実はあれ、うちの部下の手柄なんだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza lowers her booming, raspy voice.{/n} "You heard about how the clipper Saint Cognatius got hit recently? The cargo was cleaned out, everything of value taken. Well, that was my boys' handiwork!"

traits.locale_text: {n}リザは響き渡るかすれ声をさらに低くした。{/n}「最近、クリッパー船の聖コグナティウスが襲われた聖コグナティウス話を聞いたかい？貨物は一掃されて、価値のあるものはすべて略奪されたのさ。実はあれ、うちの部下の手柄なんだ！」

languages.text: {n}Ryzza senkt ihre tragende, rauchige Stimme.{/n} "Habt Ihr von dem Angriff neulich auf den Clipper St. Cognatius gehört? Die Fracht wurde entladen, alles Wertvolle mitgenommen. Nun, das waren meine Jungs!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza lowers her booming, raspy voice.{/n} "You heard about how the clipper Saint Cognatius got hit recently? The cargo was cleaned out, everything of value taken. Well, that was my boys' handiwork!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza senkt ihre tragende, rauchige Stimme.{/n} "Habt Ihr von dem Angriff neulich auf den Clipper St. Cognatius gehört? Die Fracht wurde entladen, alles Wertvolle mitgenommen. Nun, das waren meine Jungs!"

languages.text: {n}Ryzza baisse sa voix rocailleuse et tonitruante d'un ton.{/n} « Vous avez entendu parler de ce qui est arrivé au clipper Saint Cognatius, il y a peu ? Toutes les marchandises ont été volées, il ne restait plus rien de rien. Eh bien, c'était le travail de mes petits gars ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza lowers her booming, raspy voice.{/n} "You heard about how the clipper Saint Cognatius got hit recently? The cargo was cleaned out, everything of value taken. Well, that was my boys' handiwork!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza baisse sa voix rocailleuse et tonitruante d'un ton.{/n} « Vous avez entendu parler de ce qui est arrivé au clipper Saint Cognatius, il y a peu ? Toutes les marchandises ont été volées, il ne restait plus rien de rien. Eh bien, c'était le travail de mes petits gars ! »

languages.text: {n}Ryzza; gürleyen, kulak tırmalayan sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Geçenlerde Aziz Cognatius adlı gemiye hırsız girmiş, duymuş muydun? Kargoyu soyup soğana çevirmişler, değerli ne varsa çalmışlar. O işi bizim oğlanlar yaptı işte!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza lowers her booming, raspy voice.{/n} "You heard about how the clipper Saint Cognatius got hit recently? The cargo was cleaned out, everything of value taken. Well, that was my boys' handiwork!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza gürleyen, kulak tırmalayan sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Geçenlerde Aziz Cognatius adlı gemiye hırsız girmiş, duymuş muydun? Kargoyu soyup soğana çevirmişler, değerli ne varsa çalmışlar. O işi bizim oğlanlar yaptı işte!"
